text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Zhongzheng | official_name = | native_name = | native_name_lang = | other_name = | settlement_type = District | translit_lang1 = | translit_lang1_type = | translit_lang1_info = | image_skyline = Chiang Kai-shek memorial amk.jpg | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = The National Chiang Kai-shek Memorial Hall | image_map = TaipeiJhongjhengDistrict.png | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Taiwan | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Western Taipei | named_for = | seat_type = | seat = | parts_type = Divisions | parts_style = | parts = | p1 = 31 villages | p2 = 583 neighborhoods | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 7.6071 | area_rank = Ranked 11th of 12 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 163,235 | population_as_of = | population_rank = Ranked 10th of 12 | population_density_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 100 }} Zhongzheng District is a local government area of Taipei City, in the Republic of China. Many national government buildings of the Republic of China are in this district. Some are the Presidential office building, the Executive Yuan building and other government agency buildings. This district is named after the former President of the Republic of China, Chiang Kai-shek. ==References== Category:Taipei
title: Zhongzheng District
